reply.content: Hello, Sean! Now it works for Moto 360 and all round devices! Check the update :)

title: Lg g watch

author: Edditoria Yo
comment: Get the Job Done with simple feature

author: Hywel Davies

reply.author: MKIISoft
reply.content: Hello Hywel! New update available with Moto 360 support!

author: Brad Hutchison
comment: Looks good. Almost perfect. I did notice though its always running on my watch; every time I finish adjusting my settings and go back to the main page, this calculator shows up for a second or so.
title: Does the job

author: Derek Antosiek
comment: Great calculator. Zero lag and nice UI. But as it stands currently, the "clear" button in the top right interferes with mini wear launchers default pull location. It's a bit annoying.
title: Love it... But.

author: Colin Willoughby
comment: Seriously, as a developer you have the responsibility of making sure this will work on both round and square screens. Both form factors are equally a part of the official api. Will change review when this is fixed.
title: Doesn't work on moto 360

author: Shade Artist
comment: It looks great I just can't use it

reply.author: MKIISoft
reply.content: Hello Joshua! New update available with Moto 360 support!

title: I didn't exactly hate it I mean it looks great and simplistic but I don't think it works on moto 360 because when I try to use it on my moto 360 it doesn't work the app shows up on my watch but then it says unfortunately calculator has stopped I know what's up with it

author: Ryan LaMarre
comment: It crashed on launch on my LG G Watch R

reply.author: MKIISoft
reply.content: Hello Ryan! Check the update ;) now it works for LG G Watch R and all round devices.

title: It does not seem to work on the round displays.

author: Joshua Sanderson
comment: Yes everyone loves the round watches. This doesn't support it currently. You'll live, don't like it, don't download it. "It crashes on my round watch??" Learn your shapes, and don't install unless you are cool with rolling the dice. Flaming the Dev just because you are butt hurt over it is for the Apple community. Email the dev, get some info, possibly some upcoming update info. Or take the copious amounts of time you spend complaining and learn to code your own app. Have a feeling you will be more sympathetic to the dev then... Great App Dev, comes in handy!
title: Come on people, don't flame a Dev because you are too lazy to read...

author: Misfit Pierce
comment: It glitches sometimes but that may be android wear issue. All of it has bugs here and there. Hard to say but great overall calculator app.
title: Works pretty good

author: Steven Rollason
comment: This crashes on my LG G Watch R. Judging from other reviews where it crashes on the Moto 360, it looks like this app doesn't handle round displays correctly.
title: Crashes on LG G Watch R

author: Mark Boyd
comment: This app seems super cool but I can't use it. I can't be too upset since the 360 is so new but it would be nice to see support added soon! Will update my review when it works, for now I'll give 3 stars.
title: Not working on Moto 360

author: Bob Walker
comment: Neat little early app. "Start Calculator" runs it for those struggling. Probably easier to just ask Google the sum, but appreciate the effort.
title: good effort

author: jkmerlin
comment: I honestly love this app and the idea behind it, except it really really needs a back space. A small watch with big fingers means I need to restart a lot of calculations cause of one slip.
title: Good tool, missing something...

author: Andy
comment: I have a brand new moto 360 and this app force closes when opened.
title: Doesn't work on moto 360

comment: Doesn't even start.
title: Just crashes...

author: Norman Avila
comment: I can open it in spanish with "iniciar Calculeitor" pero sería mejor si tambien pudiera iniciar con el idioma español, me he forzado a usar español pues así puedo responder correos o textos o buscar contactos, aunque mi preferencia de Google Now es inglés.
title: Simple y eficiente.

author: Bram Ruttens
comment: The UI of this app is pretty and neat, but the only thing many people want is, a scientific page on this app.
title: Cleanest and most usable calculator
